HDG.BC.content: [re: clinging to beings, equating dealing w/ the actual] acting (Handeln)/effecting (Wirken) bring to experience what the actual (Wirkliche) is [?], accompanied by freedom, participation in law of age > acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s freedom [“for what is freedom? that one has the will to self-responsibility”] conceives being a self as will to power, freedom as will to fulfill “will to power” (Nietzsche thinks like/unlike Kant): participation in actuality of actual

HDG.BC.content: [in atomic age, in atomic physics] what is “unforeseeable (Unvorhersehbare),” can’t be calculated/computed in advance, shows itself as something new, can’t be explained by something else—lacks a cause (atomic physics, w/ its invalidation of law of causality, refutes Kant, all previous philosophy [?]) > what is “uncaused,” [acc. atomic physics]: “spontaneous,” free

HDG.BC.content: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)

HDG.QB.content: all Saying [of Being, of overcoming nihilism] proceeds awkwardly: must pass through essential ambiguity (Mehrdeutigkeit) of word, turn of phrase > ambiguity of Saying resides (beruht) in a play, the richer it unfolds, remains all the more rigorously maintained in concealed rule (in einer verborgenen Regel gehalten bleibt) [secret] > supreme law of Saying: freedom that frees us for ever playful jointure (allspielende Gefüge) [why jointure?] of never resting transformation (nie ruhenden Verwandlung)

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger learned from Hölderlin uselessness of coining new words > information technology robbing language of its proper laws, mere instrument (Werkzeug) of information > [Heideggerian imperative] “untiringly work outside of all publicness (Öffentlichkeit) to keep alive (lebendig zu bewahren) a thinking that is attentive to being (ein dem Sein achtsames Denken)”: lay foundation (begründen) for distant future (ferne Zukunft), possibility of tradition (Überlieferung) [to come, arrival?]
